name: @dojo/cli-upgrade-app
description: CLI command to upgrade Dojo applications

scripts.artifact:build: cd test-app && npm run build:dist:evergreen && shx mv output/dist output/dist-evergreen  && npm run build:dev:evergreen && shx mv output/dev output/dev-evergreen && npm run build:dist && npm run build:dev && npm run build:dist:evergreen
scripts.artifact:install: cd test-app && shx rm -rf node_modules && npm i && npm run install-cli-upgrade-app
scripts.artifact:package: grunt dist && grunt release-publish-flat --dry-run && shx mv dist/dojo-cli-upgrade-app-* dist/dojo-cli-upgrade-app.tgz
